message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.IR. 

The paper focuses on image matching tasks, specifically face recognition and person re-identification, which are commonly studied in the computer vision (cs.CV) field. The paper proposes a new method for image matching using adaptive convolutions, which involves constructing convolution kernels on the fly, which is a technique commonly used in deep learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the generalizability of the proposed method to handle various unseen scenarios, which is a topic commonly studied in the artificial intelligence (cs.AI) field. Additionally, the paper evaluates the proposed method on the person re-identification task, which is a subfield of multimedia (cs.MM) and information retrieval (cs.IR).
